channel.title: Need much help answrs please
channel.description: How To anti Leech Your Server So People cant steal how you make all files into a client i.e Run.bat how you change your home how you make talking npc's? how you change what npcs are wearnig how you move npcs... thanks if you know anyone of theese answers add garybuckley2008@hotmail.com

item.title: Need much help answrs please
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

  1. You put errors in your code. (MoparScape is not an anti-leech community)

  2. You can’t, but you can make them into a jar file and make the run.bat use it.

  3. Well you would change the ::home, the Magic Teleport, death spawn location and other places you teleport home to the coordinates of your new one.

  4. Click Here

  5. You’ll have to make your own NPCs to do so.

  6. Autospawn.cfg - Change the X and Y coordinates.

I found that easier than having to tell you a couple times via MSN.

Read full topic
